name: don mcgrath
what_you_do: Ted McGrath offers a system designed to help coaches, speakers, and experts attract a continuous stream of clients through a combination of online and offline marketing strategies.
who_you_serve: The primary audience includes coaches, speakers, and experts looking to grow their client base and stabilize their income.
bio: Generated 1.35 million dollars in sales online in only 27 days.
